name: Super Bike Vs Sports Car - 3D Racing Game
name_original: Super Bike Vs Sports Car - 3D Racing Game
description:
Get ready for the Extreme Racing experience of your life with Super Bike Vs Sports Car ! It will test your nerves and take you to the extreme driving capabilities. This game will test your balance skills and reaction times beyond belief.

You must use all of your Racing and dodging skills to reach the end of the Race . You’ll need quick reactions and nifty fingers, as there are many opposition players trying to take you down.Think you can dodge your way to the End Zone? Good,Fasten your seat belt, and let’s get running!

Drive beyond your imagination and rev up the gas towards enraged enemies.

Race against opponents and destroy them,Boost up your speed like no one else can! Fasten your seat belts. Get ready for the drive of your life!

It's gonna be a tough ride!

* Fantastic graphics
* Precise physics simulation
* Thrilling gameplay
* Easy controls
* Dozens of enemies to destroy.
